desc_content.paragraph: Interactively change the current frame number
Select all keyframes of channel under mouse
Delete all empty animation data containers from visible data-blocks
Handle mouse-clicks over animation channels
Collapse (i.e. close) all selected expandable animation channels

field_body.paragraph: all (boolean, (optional)) – All, Collapse all channels (not just selected ones)

desc_content.paragraph: Delete all selected animation channels
Toggle editability of selected channels
Expand (i.e. open) all selected expandable animation channels

field_body.paragraph: all (boolean, (optional)) – All, Expand all channels (not just selected ones)

desc_content.paragraph: Clears ‘disabled’ tag from all F-Curves to get broken F-Curves working again
Filter the set of channels shown to only include those with matching names

field_body.paragraph: query (string, (optional, never None)) – Text to search for in channel names

desc_content.paragraph: Add selected F-Curves to a new group

field_body.paragraph: name (string, (optional, never None)) – Name, Name of newly created group

desc_content.paragraph: Rearrange selected animation channels
Rename animation channel under mouse
Toggle selection of all animation channels

field_body.paragraph: action (enum in ['TOGGLE', 'SELECT', 'DESELECT', 'INVERT'], (optional)) – Action, Selection action to executeTOGGLE Toggle, Toggle selection for all elements.SELECT Select, Select all elements.DESELECT Deselect, Deselect all elements.INVERT Invert, Invert selection of all elements.

desc_content.paragraph: Select all animation channels within the specified region

list_item.paragraph: deselect (boolean, (optional)) – Deselect, Deselect rather than select items
extend (boolean, (optional)) – Extend, Extend selection instead of deselecting everything first

desc_content.paragraph: Disable specified setting on all selected animation channels
Enable specified setting on all selected animation channels
Toggle specified setting on all selected animation channels
Remove selected F-Curves from their current groups
Mark actions with no F-Curves for deletion after save & reload of file preserving “action libraries”

field_body.paragraph: only_unused (boolean, (optional)) – Only Unused, Only unused (Fake User only) actions get considered

desc_content.paragraph: Copy the driver for the highlighted button
Add driver for the property under the cursor
Edit the drivers for the property connected represented by the highlighted button
Remove the driver(s) for the property(s) connected represented by the highlighted button

field_body.paragraph: all (boolean, (optional)) – All, Delete drivers for all elements of the array

desc_content.paragraph: Set the current frame as the preview or scene end frame
Clear all keyframes on the currently active property

field_body.paragraph: all (boolean, (optional)) – All, Clear keyframes from all elements of the array

desc_content.paragraph: Remove all keyframe animation for selected objects
Delete keyframes on the current frame for all properties in the specified Keying Set

list_item.paragraph: type (enum in ['DEFAULT'], (optional)) – Keying Set, The Keying Set to use
confirm_success (boolean, (optional)) – Confirm Successful Delete, Show a popup when the keyframes get successfully removed

desc_content.paragraph: Delete current keyframe of current UI-active property

field_body.paragraph: all (boolean, (optional)) – All, Delete keyframes from all elements of the array

desc_content.paragraph: Remove keyframes on current frame for selected objects and bones
Insert keyframes on the current frame for all properties in the specified Keying Set

list_item.paragraph: type (enum in ['DEFAULT'], (optional)) – Keying Set, The Keying Set to use
confirm_success (boolean, (optional)) – Confirm Successful Insert, Show a popup when the keyframes get successfully added

desc_content.paragraph: Insert a keyframe for current UI-active property

field_body.paragraph: all (boolean, (optional)) – All, Insert a keyframe for all element of the array

desc_content.paragraph: Insert Keyframes for specified Keying Set, with menu of available Keying Sets if undefined

list_item.paragraph: type (enum in ['DEFAULT'], (optional)) – Keying Set, The Keying Set to use
confirm_success (boolean, (optional)) – Confirm Successful Insert, Show a popup when the keyframes get successfully added

desc_content.paragraph: Select a new keying set as the active one

field_body.paragraph: type (enum in ['DEFAULT'], (optional)) – Keying Set, The Keying Set to use

desc_content.paragraph: Add a new (empty) Keying Set to the active Scene
Export Keying Set to a python script
Add empty path to active Keying Set
Remove active Path from active Keying Set
Remove the active Keying Set
Add current UI-active property to current keying set

field_body.paragraph: all (boolean, (optional)) – All, Add all elements of the array to a Keying Set

desc_content.paragraph: Remove current UI-active property from current keying set
Paste the driver in the copy/paste buffer for the highlighted button
Clear Preview Range
Interactively define frame range used for playback
Set the current frame as the preview or scene start frame
Update fcurves/drivers affecting Transform constraints (use it with files from 2.70 and earlier)

field_body.paragraph: use_convert_to_radians (boolean, (optional)) – Convert To Radians, Convert fcurves/drivers affecting rotations to radians (Warning: use this only once!)
